title: Mastery (and rune) Pages and OCD
body:
Sooo, currently when I want to organise my mastery pages, I have to tear everything out and redo it from the beginning, which is fine every once in a while, but when I want to try a new mastery set or the like it gets shoved to the back and thus out of order.

I think it'd be a nice QoL change to be able to rearrange or organise mastery/rune pages.
It bothers me that I have mine set up like:
Support, ADC, Tank, Support variant 2, APC, APC utility etc
When it could be much more organised if you could just drag the pages around to the "correct" or a preferred order.
